Create environment variable
POST
https://api.apify.com/v2/acts/:actorId/versions/:versionNumber/env-vars

CLIENTS
Creates an environment variable of an Actor using values specified in a EnvVar object passed as JSON in the POST payload.

The request must specify name and value parameters (as strings) in the JSON payload and a Content-Type: application/json HTTP header.

{
    "name": "ENV_VAR_NAME",
    "value": "my-env-var"
}


The response is the EnvVar object as returned by the Get environment variable endpoint.

Request​
PATH PARAMETERS
actorId
string
REQUIRED

Actor ID or a tilde-separated owner's username and Actor name.

versionNumber
string
REQUIRED

Actor version

APPLICATION/JSON
BODYREQUIRED
name
string
REQUIRED
Example: MY_ENV_VAR
value
string
REQUIRED
Example: my-new-value
isSecret
boolean
NULLABLE
Example: false
Responses​
201
Response Headers
APPLICATION/JSON
Schema
Example (auto)
Example

data
object
REQUIRED
AUTHORIZATION: HTTP

CURL
	curl -L 'https://api.apify.com/v2/acts/:actorId/versions/:versionNumber/env-vars' \

	-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \

	-H 'Accept: application/json' \

	-H 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \

	-d '{

	  "name": "MY_ENV_VAR",

	  "value": "my-new-value",

	  "isSecret": false

	}'
